reviewText: I bought this for a tapdance class I am taking.  It is fun to watch Bob Scheerer dance but I could not tell what the heck he was doing with his feet.  Steve Zee slows it down but still taps pretty fast.  I ended up hitting repeat a zillion times to figure out what was going on.  Someday I'll figure it out.

Great routine, lots of fun to learn. Steve Zee does a nice job teaching. Love the interviews and old clips.

Thanks again Rusty !!!
